catalog_info.title: Estimation and Control of Dynamic Systems
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Linear differential equations, matrix algebra, and introductory probability as covered in Mathematics 21a, b and Engineering Sciences 150 or equivalents.
catalog_info.description: Study of dynamical systems with deterministic and stochastic inputs. Controllability and observability, linear quadratic control, dynamic programming and the Pontryagin maximum principle, Stochastic models and Kalman-Bucy filtering. Applications from engineering and economics.
